DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to determine the incidence of Vitamin B12 deficiency in patients on metformin therapy for diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin Use and Vitamin B12 Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Age 2080; diagnosed with type 2 diabetes for at least 30 days known vitamin B12 or folate deficiency; pernicious anemia; on vitamin B12 therapy; hematological malignancy; methotrexate use; alcohol intake greater than two drinks per day; vegetarian diet; previous gastric surgery; inflammatory bowel disease
